statements: SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices;
SELECT coin_name, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT coin_name, volume FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE volume < 100;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT coin_name, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE coin_name = 'Bitcoin';
SELECT coin_name, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE coin_name = 'Bitcoin' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT coin_name, volume FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE volume > 5000 ORDER BY volume DESC;
SELECT coin_name, timestamp FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, coin_name, price, timestamp FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE price < 50 AND volume < 1000 ORDER BY volume ASC, price ASC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices ORDER BY coin_name DESC;
SELECT coin_name, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE volume > 1000;
SELECT coin_name, trend_type FROM trend_analysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, coin_name, trend_description FROM trend_analysis ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT coin_name, trend_type FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_type = 'Bullish' ORDER BY coin_name;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE coin_name = 'Bitcoin';
SELECT coin_name, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT coin_name, volume FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY volume ASC;
SELECT coin_name, trend_type, trend_description FROM trend_analysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(price) AS highest_price, MIN(price) AS lowest_price FROM cryptocurrency_prices;
SELECT id, symbol, price, volume, timestamp FROM CryptocurrencyPrices;
SELECT symbol, price, volume FROM CryptocurrencyPrices WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT coin_name, trend_type, trend_date FROM CryptocurrencyTrends ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT id, coin_id, forecast_date, forecast_price FROM ForecastAnalysis WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, symbol, price FROM CryptocurrencyPrices WHERE symbol LIKE '%BTC%' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM CryptocurrencyPrices ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT symbol, price FROM CryptocurrencyPrices WHERE volume > 10000 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT coin_name, trend_type, trend_description FROM CryptocurrencyTrends WHERE trend_date = '2021-09-15'
SELECT cp.symbol, cp.price, ft.forecast_price FROM CryptocurrencyPrices cp INNER JOIN ForecastAnalysis ft ON cp.id = ft.coin_id WHERE ft.forecast_date = '2021-10-01'
SELECT CONCAT(coin_name, ' - ', trend_type) AS trend_info FROM CryptocurrencyTrends ORDER BY coin_name ASC
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices ORDER BY date_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT coin_name, price FROM market_cap WHERE market_cap > 1000000;
SELECT coin_name, predicted_price FROM price_predictions WHERE date_time >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT coin_name, historical_price FROM historical_data ORDER BY historical_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT coin_name, date_time FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE coin_name LIKE 'Bitcoin%' ORDER BY date_time ASC;
SELECT coin_name, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY coin_name DESC;
SELECT coin_name, market_cap FROM market_cap WHERE date_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM price_predictions WHERE predicted_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY id;
SELECT coin_name, historical_price FROM historical_data WHERE date_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT coin_name, date_time FROM price_predictions WHERE predicted_price < 50 ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices;
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE cryptocurrency_name = 'Bitcoin';
SELECT price, cryptocurrency_name FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE price > 5000;
SELECT timestamp, price, cryptocurrency_name FROM cryptocurrency_prices ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE cryptocurrency_name = 'Bitcoin' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM cryptocurrency_prices GROUP BY cryptocurrency_name HAVING AVG(price) > 10000 ORDER BY average_price DESC
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND price > 50000 ORDER BY timestamp LIMIT 10
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM cryptocurrency_prices GROUP BY cryptocurrency_name
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM cryptocurrency_prices GROUP BY cryptocurrency_name ORDER BY total_records DESC
